description: This pathway was constructed based on the Brown et al 2021 book chapter (Cholesterol Synthesis), combined with the Reactome Cholesterol Synthesis pathway (DOI:10.3180/R-HSA-191273.7) and the WikiPathways WP4718 (Cholesterol metabolism with Bloch and Kandutsch-Russell pathways (Homo sapiens)). Additional information was incorporated based on the literature. All protein were curated for cell-specific (hepatocyte) isoforms.
title: Cholesterol biosynthesis pathway in hepatocytes
